name: 测试数据：【 wintest，123456，True，0，登录成功】

statusDetails.message:
AssertionError: 接口返回码是 【 500 】, 返回信息：JSON parse error: Unrecognized token 'username': was expecting (JSON String, Number, Array, Object or token 'null', 'true' or 'false'); nested exception is com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException: Unrecognized token 'username': was expecting (JSON String, Number, Array, Object or token 'null', 'true' or 'false')
   at [Source: (org.springframework.util.StreamUtils$NonClosingInputStream); line: 1, column: 10] 
assert False == True
 +  where False = <core.result_base.ResultBase object at 0x10b496130>.success

description: 该用例是针对获取用户登录接口的测试
